title: Pierre
creator_credit: Maurice Sendak, Sheldon Riss and Weston Woods Studios
brief_description: An indifferent little boy flaunts an “I don’t care” attitude, until an encounter with a lion helps him change his mind. An excerpt from the film, “Really Rosie” adapted from “The Nutshell Kids” by Maurice Sendak with music composed and performed by Carole King.
